channel.title: ALife on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in ALife on Some Title

item.title: Completely understood Chapter 3 of Create and Move ALife
item.description: # Emergence How the pieces are defined “Open and close” is required for each individual -Open to receive changes in the environment and lock in changes to sustain yourself “Opening and closing” is a structure that recursively refers to itself and is necessary for emergence of a lifelike individual A system that has the mechanism of “the smallest unit of life” that can create and maintain itself is called “autopoiesis” SCL model One of the models that creates the concept of autopoiesis is the “SCL (Substrate Catalyst Link)” model This question of “what is emergence?
